about_the_game:
Knight Squad 2 heralds the return of a beloved multiplayer experience anyone can play and enjoy. The mechanics are simple enough for any peasant: move around the field, swing your sword, block enemy attacks, grab a bazooka, mount a unicorn, annihilate your rivals and become the champion!

Knight Squad 2 Trials allows cavaliers to create Battle Royale lobbies and join lobbies created by other men-at-arms, therefore gaining access to the full content of the game. The full version of Knight Squad 2 includes 13 game modes, 8 additional unlockable knights, and 97 battle arenas.

Online multiplayer

Duke it out with friends or challenge competitors worldwide in online lobbies.

Access to all the content

Through the lobbies created by other players, Knight Squad 2 Trials players can experience all of the game modes and maps in the full game.

8 player madness

Whether allies are around or not, matches can always be filled with customizable and challenging AI opponents.

Extremely easy to learn

Choose a classic controller or go for our intuitive keyboard and mouse controls.

Wacky weaponry

Wield weapons from the middle ages, such as the noble bow, the exotic boomerang, or sneaky proximity mines!

Customizable gameplay

Turn up the chaos by greasing up the floor, enabling exploding corpses, or mixing up the starter weapons and upgrades.

short_description: Triumph over friends in this chaotic arcade battle royale game for up to 8 players. Jump online, grab a sword, load your bazooka, and be the last knight standing in this free-to-play version of Knight Squad 2.
